articles.title: Activision: 'MW3 Is a Premium Release Priced at $70' - Insider Gaming
articles.description: Activision has gone on record stating, once again, that 2023's MW3 will be a full, premium release that carries with it a $70 price tag.
articles.content: For a few weeks, the Call of Duty community has been locked in a to-and-fro regarding the status of Modern Warfare III – which is due to release on November 10th. It was long believed that there woul… [+1473 chars]

articles.author: Ethan Siegel
articles.title: The 13 scales that define our physical Universe - Big Think
articles.description: The visible Universe extends 46.1 billion light-years from us, while we've probed scales down to as small as ~10^-19 meters.

articles.title: Boy survives 100ft Grand Canyon fall after dodging tourist photo - BBC
articles.description: The teenager suffered serious injuries when he plunged nearly 100ft (30m).
articles.content:
A 13-year-old boy has survived after slipping and falling nearly 100ft (30m) at the Grand Canyon in the US state of Arizona. 
It took rescue crews two hours to pull Wyatt Kauffman to safety on Tuesd… [+1386 chars]

articles.title: Wordle today: Wordle 786 August 14 hints and today's answer | HeraldScotland - HeraldScotland
articles.description: What is today's Wordle? - here are some hints and the answer for today's Wordle 786, August 14.
articles.content:
The aim of the game is to find a 5-letter word in only six attempts and users are given a new word to guess daily.
The game uses the same rules as Scrabble, where only real words are allowed both in… [+1671 chars]
